Description:
JASARA PMC is seeking a talented and experienced Project Manager to oversee the delivery of social infrastructure programs in Saudi Arabia. As the joint venture between Public Investment Fund, Jacobs, and Saudi Aramco, JASARA is committed to providing a solutions-based approach to turn the Kingdom's Vision 2030 into a reality. The successful candidate will join a team of professionals that inspires each other to reach new levels of performance excellence. As Project Manager, you will have the unique opportunity to work on the most exciting and complex programs in the world and bring visible change within Saudi Arabia.Lead the delivery of infrastructure programs in Saudi Arabia.
Develop, maintain, and manage project plans, budgets, and schedules.
Monitor compliance and quality control of infrastructure programs.
Manage project stakeholders, including contractors and government agencies.
Communicate progress and deliverables to senior management and other stakeholders.
Identify project risks and develop mitigation plans.
Ensure successful delivery of civil works, bridges, and other infrastructure projects.Job Details
